channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: Joe, Shereen and Stanley welcome magician Jack Rhodes into the studio for a magic morning of entertainment. Joe gets his own back on Shereen when he pulls an almighty prank! The Gilbert Twins take part in Bog Off and Hamza Yassin plays Truth or Dare. Plus two episodes of SpongeBob Squarepants and plenty of slime! Saturday Mash-Up is totally live? so anything can happen.
